citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:15 -
11:45am on 01/21/2016.
Inspector arrived at facility, knocked on residence door, honked GOV horn, called listed phone numbers. Received
call from licensee - not available.
